desc.p: This field is used when customers names are to be printed or not on the valuations reports depending on a local reference in CUSTOMER file.

Its contents should be 0 (or blank) when all names must be printed, or it must be the local reference subvalue number of the local reference field that will contain a flag (YES or NO) indicating whether the name of this customer has to be printed. If blank, the name will be printed.
Up to 3 numeric characters. No checking is made to ensure that the local reference exists in CUSTOMER file.
